sn45.159:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, agantukagaram. Tattha puratthimayapi disaya agantva vasam kappenti, pacchimayapi disaya agantva vasam kappenti, uttarayapi disaya agantva vasam kappenti, dakkhinayapi disaya agantva vasam kappenti, khattiyapi agantva vasam kappenti, brahmanapi agantva vasam kappenti, vessapi agantva vasam kappenti, suddapi agantva vasam kappenti;
sn45.159:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto ye dhamma abhinna parinneyya, te dhamme abhinna parijanati …pe…
sn45.159:1.3: ye dhamma abhinna pahatabba, te dhamme abhinna pajahati, ye dhamma abhinna sacchikatabba, te dhamme abhinna sacchikaroti, ye dhamma abhinna bhavetabba, te dhamme abhinna bhaveti.
sn45.159:2.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna parinneyya?
sn45.159:2.6: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna pahatabba?
sn45.159:2.9: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna sacchikatabba?
sn45.159:2.12: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna bhavetabba?
sn45.159:2.15: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto, ye dhamma abhinna parinneyya te dhamme abhinna parijanati …pe… ye dhamma abhinna bhavetabba, te dhamme abhinna bhaveti?
sn45.159:2.16: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …
sn45.159:2.17: evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto ye dhamma abhinna parinneyya, te dhamme abhinna parijanati, ye dhamma abhinna pahatabba, te dhamme abhinna pajahati, ye dhamma abhinna sacchikatabba, te dhamme abhinna sacchikaroti, ye dhamma abhinna bhavetabba, te dhamme abhinna bhaveti”ti.
